pkgmetadata.longdescription: # This is a sample Python script.# Press ⌃R to execute it or replace it with your code.# Press Double ⇧ to search everywhere for classes, files, tool windows, actions, and settings.def print_hi(name): # Use a breakpoint in the code line below to debug your script. print(f'Hi, {name}') # Press ⌘F8 to toggle the breakpoint.# Press the green button in the gutter to run the script.if __name__ == '__main__': print_hi('PyCharm')# See PyCharm help at https://www.jetbrains.com/help/pycharm/
